edges.label: 1. Forensic Audit Triggered Investigation
edges.tooltip: The forensic audit report by Chartered Accountants identified issues that led to the investigation.

edges.label: 2. Investigation Conducted By
edges.tooltip: Investigation Task Force Kosovo conducted the investigation into financial irregularities.

edges.label: 3. Subject of Investigation
edges.tooltip: The investigation focused on financial irregularities in cash withdrawals from ATCS accounts.

edges.label: 4. Management Oversight
edges.tooltip: The Division Manager was responsible for overseeing financial operations at ATCS.

edges.label: 5. Financial Mismanagement
edges.tooltip: The ATCS Official was involved in financial mismanagement and lack of oversight.

edges.label: 6. Reported Documentation Issues
edges.tooltip: Finance Officer 1 identified lack of necessary expenditure documentation.

edges.label: 7. Highlighted Financial Software Deficiency
edges.tooltip: Finance Officer 2 noted the absence of advanced financial software at ATCS.

edges.label: 8. Oversight Authority
edges.tooltip: KTA under UNMIK Pillar IV was responsible for oversight of financial operations.

edges.label: 9. Oversight Responsibility
edges.tooltip: UNMIK Pillar IV was responsible for ensuring compliance at Prishtina Airport.

edges.label: 10. Legal Framework
edges.tooltip: The investigation was conducted under the framework of UNSCR 1244 (1999).

edges.label: 11. Legal Authority
edges.tooltip: The investigation was authorized under UNMIK Regulation No. 1999/1.

edges.label: 12. Employment Law Considerations
edges.tooltip: The investigation considered employment law under UNMIK Regulation No. 2001/27.

edges.label: 13. Allegations of Misappropriation
edges.tooltip: The ATCS Official was alleged to have misappropriated funds.

edges.label: 14. Allegations of Negligence
edges.tooltip: The Division Manager was alleged to have neglected financial oversight responsibilities.

ATCS: Irregular cash withdrawals and lack of documentation.
Disorganized financial management and inadequate documentation.
Division_Manager: Failure to oversee financial operations effectively.
Ignored fraud potential as mentioned in the forensic audit.
ATCS_Official: Misappropriation of funds for non-business-related expenses.
